wikipedia_page.main: Derek Chittock (21 February 1922 – 21 February 1986) was a British art critic, art historian and portrait painter. He was also active as a cartoonist, creating the gag comics Bennie and Barley Bottom in the late 1950s, early 1960s.

response: * February 21: Derek Chittock, aka Droc, aka Lucian, British art critic, painter and cartoonist (Bennie, Barley Bottom), dies at age 64.

link_mentions.page: List of painters by name beginning with "C"
response: *Derek Chittock (1922–1986), English painter, cartoonist and art critic
